verses.verse: And it came to pass,<WH1961> when all<WH3605> the kings<WH4428> which<WH834> were on this side<WH5676> Jordan,<WH3383> in the hills,<WH2022> and in the valleys,<WH8219> and in all<WH3605> the coasts<WH2348> of the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220> over<WH413> against<WH4136> Lebanon,<WH3844> the Hittite,<WH2850> and the Amorite,<WH567> the Canaanite,<WH3669> the Perizzite,<WH6522> the Hivite,<WH2340> and the Jebusite,<WH2983> heard<WH8085> thereof;
That they gathered themselves<WH6908> together,<WH3162> to fight<WH3898> with<WH5973> Joshua<WH3091> and with<WH5973> Israel,<WH3478> with one<WH259> accord.<WH6310>
And when the inhabitants<WH3427> of Gibeon<WH1391> heard<WH8085> <WH853> what<WH834> Joshua<WH3091> had done<WH6213> unto Jericho<WH3405> and to Ai,<WH5857>

They <WH1992> did work<WH6213> wilily,<WH6195> and went<WH1980> and made as if they had been ambassadors,<WH6737> and took<WH3947> old<WH1087> sacks<WH8242> upon their asses,<WH2543> and wine<WH3196> bottles,<WH4997> old,<WH1087> and rent,<WH1234> and bound up;<WH6887>

And old<WH1087> shoes<WH5275> and clouted<WH2921> upon their feet,<WH7272> and old<WH1087> garments<WH8008> upon<WH5921> them; and all<WH3605> the bread<WH3899> of their provision<WH6718> was dry<WH3001> and moldy.<WH5350>

And they went<WH1980> to<WH413> Joshua<WH3091> unto<WH413> the camp<WH4264> at Gilgal,<WH1537> and said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, and to<WH413> the men<WH376> of Israel,<WH3478> We be come<WH935> from a far country:<WH4480> <WH776> <WH7350> now<WH6258> therefore make<WH3772> ye a league<WH1285> with us.

And the men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> unto<WH413> the Hivites,<WH2340> Peradventure<WH194> ye<WH859> dwell<WH3427> among<WH7130> us; and how<WH349> shall we make<WH3772> a league<WH1285> with you?

And they said<WH559> unto<WH413> Joshua,<WH3091> We<WH587> are thy servants.<WH5650> And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Who<WH4310> are ye?<WH859> and from whence<WH4480> <WH370> come<WH935> ye?

And they said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, From a very far country<WH4480> <WH776> <WH3966> <WH7350> thy servants<WH5650> are come<WH935> because of the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God:<WH430> for<WH3588> we have heard<WH8085> the fame<WH8089> of him, and all<WH3605> that<WH834> he did<WH6213> in Egypt,<WH4714>

And all<WH3605> that<WH834> he did<WH6213> to the two<WH8147> kings<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> that<WH834> were beyond<WH5676> Jordan,<WH3383> to Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of Heshbon,<WH2809> and to Og<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan,<WH1316> which<WH834> was at Ashtaroth.<WH6252>

Wherefore our elders<WH2205> and all<WH3605> the inhabitants<WH3427> of our country<WH776> spoke<WH559> to<WH413> us, saying,<WH559> Take<WH3947> victuals<WH6720> with you<WH3027> for the journey,<WH1870> and go<WH1980> to meet<WH7125> them, and say<WH559> unto<WH413> them, We<WH587> are your servants:<WH5650> therefore now<WH6258> make<WH3772> ye a league<WH1285> with us.

This <WH2088> our bread<WH3899> we took hot<WH2525> for our provision<WH6679> out of our houses<WH4480> <WH1004> on the day<WH3117> we came forth<WH3318> to go<WH1980> unto<WH413> you; but now,<WH6258> behold,<WH2009> it is dry,<WH3001> and it is<WH1961> moldy: <WH5350>

And these<WH428> bottles<WH4997> of wine,<WH3196> which<WH834> we filled,<WH4390> were new;<WH2319> and, behold,<WH2009> they be rent:<WH1234> and these<WH428> our garments<WH8008> and our shoes<WH5275> are become old<WH1086> by reason of the very<WH3966> long<WH4480> <WH7230> journey.<WH1870>
And the men<WH376> took<WH3947> of their victuals,<WH4480> <WH6718> and asked<WH7592> not<WH3808> counsel at the mouth<WH6310> of the LORD.<WH3068>

And Joshua<WH3091> made<WH6213> peace<WH7965> with them, and made<WH6213> a league<WH1285> with them, to let them live:<WH2421> and the princes<WH5387> of the congregation<WH5712> swore<WH7650> unto them.

And it came to pass<WH1961> at the end<WH4480> <WH7097> of three<WH7969> days<WH3117> after<WH310> <WH834> they had made<WH3772> a league<WH1285> with them, that they heard<WH8085> that<WH3588> they<WH1992> were their<WH413> neighbors,<WH7138> and that they<WH1992> dwelt<WH3427> among<WH7130> them.

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> journeyed,<WH5265> and came<WH935> unto<WH413> their cities<WH5892> on the third<WH7992> day.<WH3117> Now their cities<WH5892> were Gibeon,<WH1391> and Chephirah,<WH3716> and Beeroth,<WH881> and Kirjath-jearim.<WH7157>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> smote<WH5221> them not,<WH3808> because<WH3588> the princes<WH5387> of the congregation<WH5712> had sworn<WH7650> unto them by the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478> And all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> murmured<WH3885> against<WH5921> the princes.<WH5387>

But all<WH3605> the princes<WH5387> said<WH559> unto<WH413> all<WH3605> the congregation,<WH5712> We<WH587> have sworn<WH7650> unto them by the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel:<WH3478> now<WH6258> therefore we may<WH3201> not<WH3808> touch<WH5060> them.

This <WH2063> we will do<WH6213> to them; we will even let them live,<WH2421> <WH853> lest<WH3808> wrath<WH7110> be<WH1961> upon<WH5921> us, because of<WH5921> the oath<WH7621> which<WH834> we swore<WH7650> unto them.

And the princes<WH5387> said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Let them live;<WH2421> but let them be<WH1961> hewers<WH2404> of wood<WH6086> and drawers<WH7579> of water<WH4325> unto all<WH3605> the congregation;<WH5712> as<WH834> the princes<WH5387> had promised<WH1696> them.

And Joshua<WH3091> called<WH7121> for them, and he spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> them, saying,<WH559> Wherefore<WH4100> have ye beguiled<WH7411> us, saying,<WH559> We<WH587> are very<WH3966> far<WH7350> from<WH4480> you; when ye<WH859> dwell<WH3427> among<WH7130> us?

Now <WH6258> therefore ye<WH859> are cursed,<WH779> and there shall none<WH3808> of<WH4480> you be freed<WH3772> from being bondmen,<WH5650> and hewers<WH2404> of wood<WH6086> and drawers<WH7579> of water<WH4325> for the house<WH1004> of my God.<WH430>

And they answered<WH6030> <WH853> Joshua,<WH3091> and said,<WH559> Because<WH3588> it was certainly told<WH5046> <WH5046> thy servants,<WH5650> <WH853> how that<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> his servant<WH5650> <WH853> Moses<WH4872> to give<WH5414> you all<WH3605> the land,<WH776> and to destroy<WH8045> <WH853> all<WH3605> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> you, therefore we were sore<WH3966> afraid<WH3372> of our lives<WH5315> because of<WH4480> <WH6440> you, and have done<WH6213> <WH853> this<WH2088> thing.<WH1697>
And now,<WH6258> behold,<WH2009> we are in thine hand:<WH3027> as it seemeth good<WH2896> and right<WH3477> unto thee<WH5869> to do<WH6213> unto us, do.<WH6213>
And so<WH3651> did<WH6213> he unto them, and delivered<WH5337> them out of the hand<WH4480> <WH3027> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> that they slew<WH2026> them not.<WH3808>

And Joshua<WH3091> made<WH5414> them that<WH1931> day<WH3117> hewers<WH2404> of wood<WH6086> and drawers<WH7579> of water<WH4325> for the congregation,<WH5712> and for the altar<WH4196> of the LORD,<WH3068> even unto<WH5704> this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> in<WH413> the place<WH4725> which<WH834> he should choose.<WH977>
